SEARCH
Module Project_Milestone_5
Package inventory

Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
inventory.InventoryManager
public class InventoryManager extends Object
The `InventoryManager` class represents a manager for inventory items in a store. It provides methods to load, manage, and interact with the store's inventory of salable products.

The inventory is stored as a collection of salable products, and it can be loaded from and saved to a file. This class offers functionality to add, remove, purchase, and cancel the purchase of products, as well as display the inventory and perform sorting operations.

Additionally, it can update the inventory from a data string and retrieve the inventory as a formatted string.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Your Name

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryManager

      public InventoryManager(String filePath)
      Constructor for the `InventoryManager` class. Initializes the inventory manager with an empty product collection and loads inventory data from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path to the inventory data file.

  • Method Details

    • getInventory

      public List<Salable> getInventory()
      Gets the current inventory as a list of salable products.
      Returns:
      A list of salable products representing the inventory.

    • getProduct

      public Salable getProduct(String name)
      Gets a product from the inventory by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The salable product with the specified name, or null if not found.

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(Salable product)
      Adds a new product to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      product - The salable product to add.

    • removeProduct

      public boolean removeProduct(Salable product, int quantity)
      Removes a specified quantity of a product from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      product - The salable product to remove.
      quantity - The quantity of the product to remove.
      Returns:
      `true` if the removal was successful, `false` if the product is not found or the quantity is not available.

    • purchaseProduct

      public boolean purchaseProduct(String name, int quantity)
      Purchases a specified quantity of a product, reducing its quantity in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product to purchase.
      quantity - The quantity of the product to purchase.
      Returns:
      `true` if the purchase was successful, `false` if the product is not found or the quantity is not available.

    • cancelPurchase

      public boolean cancelPurchase(String name, int quantity)
      Cancels the purchase of a product and restores its quantity in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product to cancel the purchase for.
      quantity - The quantity of the product to cancel.
      Returns:
      `true` if the purchase was successfully canceled and the product's quantity was restored, `false` if the product is not found or the specified quantity is not available for cancelation.

    • displayInventory

      public void displayInventory()
      Displays the current inventory, including product details such as type, name, description, price, and quantity.

      Saves the current inventory data to a file.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
